game.name: Cloudheim
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 라그나로크가 세상을 초토화한 뒤, 신들은 다음 세상을 만들어가기 위해 당신을 선택했습니다. Cloudheim은 제작과 혼돈의 물리 기반 전투를 조합한 1-4명 플레이어 액션 어드벤쳐 게임입니다. 잊힌 신들을 깨우고, 부패를 몰아내고, 천상에 연 당신의 상점을 업그레이드하여 부서진 영역을 다시 화합으로 이끄세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ragnarok shattered the world, and the gods have chosen you to shape the next one. Cloudheim is a 1-4 player action adventure that blends crafting with chaotic physics-based combat. Awaken forgotten deities, drive back corruption, and upgrade your shop in the sky to bring harmony to a broken realm.

reviewHighlights.text: My mom and I love to play games together since we're long distance and we were obsessed with the demo, though it needed some tlc here and there. Good...
I'm writing this review with 100 hrs of gameplay over two sessions (one with 75 hrs and one with 25 hrs) Overall a decent game, but littered with bugs...
